races.name: Human
races.description: Adaptable and resourceful, humans are found throughout the galaxy.
races.lore: Humans have spread across countless worlds, adapting to various environments and establishing themselves as a dominant species in the galaxy. Their adaptability and resourcefulness have allowed them to thrive in even the harshest conditions.

races.name: Engineer
races.description: Cybernetically enhanced humans with an innate understanding of technology.
races.lore: Engineers are humans who have undergone extensive cybernetic enhancement, integrating technology directly into their nervous systems. This gives them an intuitive understanding of machines and electronics, making them invaluable for maintaining and repairing equipment.

races.name: K'Erin
races.description: Hulking aliens with a natural affinity for close combat.
races.lore: The K'Erin are a proud warrior race known for their physical prowess and code of honor. They prefer close combat and consider ranged weapons to be somewhat dishonorable, though pragmatism often wins out over tradition in the harsh reality of the frontier.

races.name: Soulless
races.description: Mysterious beings with enhanced physical and mental capabilities.
races.lore: The Soulless are a cybernetic species connected to a hive intelligence. Individual units maintain autonomy but share information across their network. Their origins are shrouded in mystery, with some believing they were created as weapons in a forgotten war.

races.name: Precursor
races.description: Ancient race with advanced technology and mysterious abilities.
races.lore: The Precursors are an ancient species that explored the stars when most other races were still primitive. Their advanced technology and understanding of the universe give them unique insights, but their numbers are few, and they guard their secrets closely.

races.name: Feral
races.description: Genetically engineered humanoid-animal hybrids with enhanced physical abilities.
races.lore: Ferals were originally created as specialized soldiers, combining human intelligence with animal traits for enhanced combat capabilities. After gaining independence, they established their own communities and culture, though they still face prejudice in many parts of the galaxy.

races.name: Swift
races.description: Agile, winged humanoids with exceptional mobility.
races.lore: The Swift are diminutive, winged humanoids known for their erratic, jerky movements. Their ability to glide and leap great distances makes them excellent scouts and infiltrators. They have a unique perspective on the world, often seeing patterns that others miss.

races.name: Bot
races.description: Autonomous robotic units with specialized programming and capabilities.
races.lore: Bots come in countless configurations, from combat models to utility units. While most are simple automatons, some advanced models develop a form of sentience over time. These units are often viewed with suspicion, but their reliability makes them valuable crew members.
